title: Scout for Soybean Aphids
description: An agronomist needs to scout a soybean field to determine if the aphid population has reached the economic threshold for treatment.

tasks.description: Guide the agronomist on the proper method for scouting soybean aphids (e.g., check 20-30 plants, count aphids per plant).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear, standard scouting instructions.

tasks.description: Receive the aphid counts from the agronomist and calculate the average number of aphids per plant.
Compare the average to the established economic threshold of 250 aphids per plant.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the population is below the threshold.

tasks.description: Recommend not to spray at this time, but to scout again in 5-7 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a financially and environmentally sound recommendation.
